sentence.Network_en: The motion to adjourn was carried.
I am afraid the court may not adjourn until three or even later.
sentence.Network_cn: 我担心法庭要到3点或更晚时才会休庭。

sentence.Network_en: Why don't we adjourn to the local hostelry?
sentence.Network_cn: 我们怎麽不搬到本地旅馆去住 呢 ?

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'summon someone to appear on a particular day'): from Old French ajorner, from the phrase a jorn (nome) 'to an (appointed) day'

entry.def: If a meeting or trial is adjourned or if it adjourns, it is stopped for a short time.

example.ex: The proceedings have now been adjourned until next week...
I am afraid the court may not adjourn until three or even later.
example.tran: 我担心法庭要到3点或更晚时才会休庭。

means.word_mean: 1. close at the end of a session;
2. break from a meeting or gathering;

auth_sentence.content: But the Legislature doesn't adjourn until Memorial Day.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the Legislature doesn't adjourn until Memorial Day.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the Legislature doesn't adjourn until Memorial Day.

auth_sentence.content: I adjourn what I have to say on this topic.
auth_sentence.res_content: I adjourn what I have to say on this topic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I adjourn what I have to say on this topic.

auth_sentence.content: Therefore a motion was made to adjourn for half an hour, that this civility might be paid.
auth_sentence.res_content: Therefore a motion was made to adjourn for half an hour, that this civility might be paid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Therefore a motion was made to adjourn for half an hour, that this civility might be paid.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定期刊物,杂志,日报;日志,日记
stems_affixes.word_buile: journ日期+al……的→n.定期刊物,杂志,日报;日志,日记
journal杂志,日报+ist人→n.记者,新闻工作者
journ日期+ey→n.旅行,旅程 v.旅行
ad加强,增加+journ日期→增加日期
journ日期+ey→n.旅行,旅程 v.旅行

sentences.en: The meeting adjourned at five o'clock.

jushi.chinese: 我们停下来吃午饭好吗？

jushi.english: This court will adjourn until tomorrow.
jushi.chinese: 本法庭暂时休庭,明日继续审理。
